name: contactlist-monorepo
description: ContactList app (web + Netlify functions) single-tenant per-campaign deployment

scripts.build:all: npm --prefix functions ci && npm --prefix functions run build:prod && npm --prefix web ci && npm --prefix web run build
scripts.build:web: npm --prefix web ci && npm --prefix web run build
scripts.build:functions: npm --prefix functions ci && npm --prefix functions run build:prod
scripts.lint: npm --prefix functions run lint && npm --prefix web run lint
scripts.test: npm --prefix functions run test && npm --prefix web run test
